mapper.sql: record_id, uid, packet_prod_cash_id, packet_num, record_status, create_time, bank_card, bank_card_name, open_bank_code, real_tran_type, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from packet_withdraw_record
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into packet_withdraw_record (record_id, uid, packet_prod_cash_id, packet_num, record_status, create_time, bank_card, bank_card_name, open_bank_code, real_tran_type, update_time,tran_type) values (#{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{packetProdCashId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{packetNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realTranType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{tranType,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update packet_withdraw_record
record_id = #{record.recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uid = #{record.uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
packet_prod_cash_id = #{record.packetProdCashId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
packet_num = #{record.packetNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
record_status = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bank_card = #{record.bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_card_name = #{record.bankCardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_bank_code = #{record.openBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_tran_type = #{record.realTranType,jdbcType=BIT},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tran_type = #{record.tranType,jdbcType=BIT},

update packet_withdraw_record set record_id = #{record.recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uid = #{record.uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, packet_prod_cash_id = #{record.packetProdCashId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, packet_num = #{record.packetNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, record_status = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bank_card = #{record.bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card_name = #{record.bankCardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_bank_code = #{record.openBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_tran_type = #{record.realTranType,jdbcType=BIT}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tran_type = #{record.tranType,jdbcType=BIT}

update packet_withdraw_record
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
packet_prod_cash_id = #{packetProdCashId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
packet_num = #{packetNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
record_status = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
bank_card = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_card_name = #{bankCardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_bank_code = #{openBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_tran_type = #{realTranType,jdbcType=BIT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tran_type = #{tranType,jdbcType=BIT},
merchant_order_no = #{merchantOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pingxx_id = #{pingxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update packet_withdraw_record set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, packet_prod_cash_id = #{packetProdCashId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, packet_num = #{packetNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, record_status = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bank_card = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card_name = #{bankCardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_bank_code = #{openBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_tran_type = #{realTranType,jdbcType=BIT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tran_type = #{tranType,jdbcType=BIT} where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select ur.record_id as record_id, ur.packet_num as packet_num, ur.record_status as record_status, ur.create_time as create_time, u.uid as uid ,u.erban_no as erban_no,u.nick as nick,u.phone as phone ,u.alipay_account as alipay_account,u.alipay_account_name as alipay_account_name, ubc.bank_card as cardNumber,ubc.bank_card_name as cardName,ubc.open_bank_code as openBankCode,u.withdraw_status as withdrawStatus,a.weixin_openid as wxOpenId from packet_withdraw_record ur INNER JOIN users u ON ur.uid=u.uid INNER JOIN account a ON u.uid = a.uid left join user_bank_card ubc on ur.uid = ubc.uid and ubc.is_use = 1 WHERE ur.record_status !=2 and u.withdraw_status = 0 and ur.record_id IN
#{item}

select ur.record_id as record_id, ur.packet_num as packet_num, ur.record_status as record_status, ur.create_time as create_time, u.uid as uid ,u.erban_no as erban_no,u.nick as nick,u.phone as phone ,u.alipay_account as alipay_account,u.alipay_account_name as alipay_account_name, ur.bank_card as cardNumber,ur.bank_card_name as cardName,ur.open_bank_code as openBankCode,u.withdraw_status as withdrawStatus,a.weixin_openid as wxOpenId from packet_withdraw_record ur INNER JOIN users u ON ur.uid=u.uid INNER JOIN account a ON u.uid = a.uid WHERE ur.record_status !=2 and u.withdraw_status = 0 and ur.record_id = #{recordId}
